GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.15.24
GSD.description:
phy: ti: Fix missing sentinel for clk_div_table

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.24 by commit 7a360e546ad9e7c3fd53d6bb60348c660cd28f54, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit 091876cc355d6739e393efa4b3d07f451a6a035c. For more details please see the references link.
